title: Nutricook Glass Kettle 2200W, 1.7L, Double wall Cool touch exterior, Auto Shut Off, Boil dry Protection, LED Indicator, 360° swivel base, Power Cord Storage, 2 Yr Warranty, GK100

all_images.alt: Nutricook Glass Kettle 2200W, 1.7L, Double wall Cool touch exterior, Auto Shut Off, Boil dry Protection, LED Indicator, 360° swivel base, Power Cord Storage, 2 Yr Warranty, GK100
Nutricook Glass Kettle 2200W, 1.7L, Double wall Cool touch exterior, Auto Shut Off, Boil dry Protection, LED Indicator, 360° swivel base, Power Cord Storage, 2 Yr Warranty, GK100

raw_desc: Double-Wall Insulation – Thoughtfully engineered with a premium glass inner wall to preserve water’s purity and heat, paired with a protective outer shell that stays cool to the touch. This dual-layer design not only keeps your water hotter for longer but also ensures safe handling without the risk of burns. 2200W Powerful Heating – Equipped with a high-performance 2200W heating element, the kettle delivers rapid boiling in just minutes. This powerful output not only saves you valuable time but also ensures you can enjoy hot water instantly for tea, coffee, or cooking needs. Smart Boil Dry Protection: Automatically shuts off when the kettle is empty, preventing damage and ensuring safety for worry-free use. Sleek White Light Indicator: A stylish white light illuminates while boiling, giving you a modern visual cue as your water heats up. British STRIX Thermostat: Equipped with a reliable STRIX thermostat control for precise temperature management and long-lasting performance. Effortless 360° Swivel Base: Enjoy easy handling from any angle with the fully rotating base, perfect for seamless lifting and placing.

specifications.Special Features: ‎Automatic Shut-Off, Boil Dry Protection, Concealed Heating, Double Wall, Heat Resistant Handle, Indicator Light, Locking Spout, Rotatable Base
